title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.3 - Filing with commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.3 - Filing with commission

State Regulations

All partnerships having any property, ownership or racing
interest in a horse, and the name and address of every individual having any
such interest in a horse, the relative proportions of such interest and the
terms of any sale with contingencies, of any lease or of any arrangement must
be signed by all the parties or by their authorized agents and be filed
annually at the office of the commission or with the clerk of the course for
transmission to that office and must be approved by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
